channel.title: Java applet in a JFrame?

item.title: Java applet in a JFrame?
item.dc:creator: @HcoJustin HcoJustin
item.description:
@HcoJustin wrote:

[quote=“pkkid, post:7, topic:416029”][quote author=HcoJustin link=topic=517971.msg3766574#msg3766574 date=1317275513]
That would be from

You could either implement your own AppletStub to return a proper codebase for when you run it through the frame, or override it in game to return a proper path.
[/quote]
I tried this guide. I just added those 2 classes and ran the program.
Nothing changed =([/quote]

All you need is the AppletStub, and just adding them wont work, you have to tell the Applet to use them…

Read full topic

item.title: Java applet in a JFrame?
item.dc:creator: @pkkid pkkid
item.description:
@pkkid wrote:

[quote=“HcoJustin, post:4, topic:416029”]Try

applet.init() and applet.start() after you make the frame visible[/quote]

[code] public static void main(String[] args) {

	    game applet = new game();

	    JFrame frame = new JFrame("My applet, as application");
	    frame.setVisible(true);
	    frame.getContentPane().add(applet);
	    frame.setDefaultCloseOperation(JFrame.EXIT_ON_CLOSE);
	    frame.pack();
	    frame.show();
	    applet.init();
	    applet.start();
	}[/code]

I tried this and I get this error:
(the game class is in the first post!)

Exception in thread "main" java.lang.NullPointerException at java.applet.Applet.getCodeBase(Unknown Source) at game.init(game.java:68) at game.main(game.java:58)

Read full topic

item.title: Java applet in a JFrame?
item.dc:creator: @HcoJustin HcoJustin
item.description:
@HcoJustin wrote:

Try

applet.init() and applet.start() after you make the frame visible

Read full topic

[quote=“HcoJustin, post:2, topic:416029”]My guess would be it can’t properly find the images to load.[/quote]It also doesnt load the MousePressed, KeyPressed methods etc.

item.title: Java applet in a JFrame?
item.dc:creator: @pkkid pkkid
item.description:
@pkkid wrote:

Applet code (without the Main class)
Source: Pastebin

[code]import java.applet.Applet;
import java.awt.Color;
import java.awt.Font;
import java.awt.Graphics;
import java.awt.Image;
import java.awt.event.KeyEvent;
import java.awt.event.KeyListener;
import java.awt.event.MouseEvent;
import java.awt.event.MouseListener;
import java.awt.event.MouseMotionListener;
import java.io.File;
import java.io.FileNotFoundException;
import java.util.Formatter;
import java.util.Scanner;

import javax.swing.JOptionPane;
 
public class game extends Applet implements Runnable, MouseListener, MouseMotionListener, KeyListener{
 
        static int WindowLenght = 1010;
        static int WindowHeight = 501;
        int x_PLAYER, y_PLAYER;                
        int MOUSEx, MOUSEy;
        String pass;
        int speed = 6;
        Thread th;
        boolean admin = false;
        boolean paused = false;
        boolean invtab =true;
        boolean settab = false;
        boolean friendtab = false;
        boolean questtab = false;
    Font defaul = new Font ("Arial", Font.PLAIN, 14);
        Image map;
        Image player;
        Image invent;
        Image quest;
        Image friendL;
        Image sett;
        Image tabbar;
        String examine = " ";
       
        public void init() {
                setSize(WindowLenght, WindowHeight);
            addMouseListener(this);
            addMouseMotionListener(this);
            addKeyListener(this);
            this.setFocusable(true);
                player = getImage(getCodeBase(),"images/player.gif");
                sett = getImage(getCodeBase(),"images/settings.png");
                map = getImage(getCodeBase (), "images/map.png");
                invent = getImage(getCodeBase(),"images/inventory.png");
                quest = getImage(getCodeBase(),"images/quests.png");
                friendL = getImage(getCodeBase(),"images/friendlist.png");
                tabbar = getImage(getCodeBase(),"images/tabsbar.png");
                try {
                        Scanner x = new Scanner(new File("player/x.PLAYER"));
                        Scanner y = new Scanner(new File("player/y.PLAYER"));
                        while(x.hasNext() && y.hasNext()){
                                String a = x.next();
                                String b = y.next();
                                int posx = Integer.parseInt(a);
                                int posy = Integer.parseInt(b);                
                                y_PLAYER = posy;
                                x_PLAYER = posx;
                        }
                } catch (FileNotFoundException e) {
                        e.printStackTrace();
                }
    }
 
    public void start() {
                Thread th = new Thread (this);
                th.start ();
    }
 
    public void stop() {
        paused = true;
    }
 
    public void destroy() {
        int SAVE0 = JOptionPane.showConfirmDialog(null, "           Spel opslaan?", "t", JOptionPane.YES_NO_OPTION);
        if(SAVE0 == 0){
                String a = String.valueOf(x_PLAYER);
                String b = String.valueOf(y_PLAYER);
                try {
                                Formatter x = new Formatter("player/x.PLAYER");
                                x.format("%s", a);
                                x.close();
                                Formatter y = new Formatter("player/y.PLAYER");
                                y.format("%s", b);
                                y.close();
                        } catch (FileNotFoundException e) {
                                e.printStackTrace();
                        }
        }
    }
   
    public void run(){
                Thread.currentThread().setPriority(Thread.MIN_PRIORITY);
                while (true)
                {
                        walls();
                        repaint();
                        try
                        {
                                Thread.sleep (10);
                        }
                        catch (InterruptedException ex){              
                        }
                        Thread.currentThread().setPriority(Thread.MAX_PRIORITY);
                }
    }
 
        private void walls() {
                for(int k=0; y_PLAYER <= -60; k++){
                        y_PLAYER+=k;
                }
               
        }
 
        public void paint (Graphics g){
            g.setFont(defaul);
             //map
            g.drawImage (map, x_PLAYER, y_PLAYER, this);
            //player
            g.drawImage(player, 490, 390, this);
            //inventory tabs
            g.drawImage(tabbar, 874, 300, this);
            g.drawRect(874, 472, 135, 28);
        g.drawRect(874, 300, 135, 200);
        g.drawRect(874, 472, 32, 28);
        g.drawRect(906, 472, 31, 28);
        g.drawRect(937, 472, 31, 28);
            g.drawImage(sett, 972, 474, this);
            g.drawImage(friendL, 940, 474, this);
            g.drawImage(quest, 911, 477, this);
            g.drawImage(invent, 876, 474, this);          
            //tabs
            if(invtab){
                g.drawString("rommel 1", 100, 100);
            }
            if(settab){
                g.drawString("rommel 2", 100, 100);
            }
            if(questtab){
                g.drawString("rommel 3", 100, 100);
            }
            if(friendtab){
                g.drawString("rommel 4", 100, 100);
            }
             //examine(hover over object)
            String n = String.valueOf(x_PLAYER);
            String m = String.valueOf(y_PLAYER);
            //g.drawString(n, 4, 13);
            //g.drawString(m, 37, 13);
            g.drawString(examine, 4, 13);
            //admin
            if(admin){
                 g.drawImage(invent, 200, 200, this);  
            }
            //pause screen
            if(paused){
                g.setColor(Color.GREEN);
                g.fillRect(331, 153, 300, 150);
                g.setColor(Color.black);
                g.drawRect(330, 152, 301, 151);
                g.drawString("zzzzzzzzz", 362, 200);
                g.drawString("zzzzzzzzzz", 362, 221);
                g.setColor(Color.gray);
                g.fillRect(432, 255, 60, 25);
                g.setColor(Color.BLACK);
                g.drawRect(431, 254, 61, 26);
                g.drawString("OK", 449, 273);
            }
 
                        }
       
        private Image dbImage;
        private Graphics dbg;
        public void update (Graphics g){
            if (dbImage == null)
            {
                dbImage = createImage (this.getSize().width, this.getSize().height);
                dbg = dbImage.getGraphics ();
            }
            dbg.setColor (getBackground ());
            dbg.fillRect (0, 0, this.getSize().width, this.getSize().height);
            dbg.setColor (getForeground());
            paint (dbg);
            g.drawImage (dbImage, 0, 0, this);
        }
       
       
          public void keyPressed( KeyEvent e ) {
                  int key = e.getKeyCode();
                 
                         switch(key){
                         case KeyEvent.VK_S:
                                 y_PLAYER-=speed;
                                 break;
                         case KeyEvent.VK_W:
                                 y_PLAYER+=speed;
                                 break;
                         case KeyEvent.VK_A:
                                 x_PLAYER+=speed;
                                 break;
                         case KeyEvent.VK_D:
                                x_PLAYER-=speed;
                                 break;
                         case KeyEvent.VK_P:
                                paused = true;
                                 break;
                         case KeyEvent.VK_NUMPAD0:
                                 pass = JOptionPane.showInputDialog(null, "Vul uw wachtwoord in", "AdminPane", JOptionPane.QUESTION_MESSAGE);
                                 if(pass.equals(examine)){
                                         admin = true;
                                 }
                                 break;
                        default:
                                x_PLAYER+=0;
                                y_PLAYER+=0;
                                admin = false;
                                paused = false;
                                break;
                         }      
          }
           public void keyReleased( KeyEvent e ) { }
           public void keyTyped( KeyEvent e ) {
              }
 
           public void mousePressed( MouseEvent e ) {
                      MOUSEx = e.getX();
                      MOUSEy = e.getY();
                      System.out.println(MOUSEx);
                      System.out.println(MOUSEy);
                     
                      //clicks on objects
                      if ( 432 < MOUSEx && MOUSEx < 432+60 && 255 < MOUSEy && MOUSEy < 255+25 ) {
                          //pause screen
                                 paused = false;
                              }else if ( 972 < MOUSEx && MOUSEx < 972+38 && 472 < MOUSEy && MOUSEy < 472+26 ) {
                                         //settings tab
                                  settab = true;
                                  invtab = false;
                                  questtab = false;
                                  friendtab = false;
                                      }else if ( 937 < MOUSEx && MOUSEx < 940+31 && 472 < MOUSEy && MOUSEy < 472+26 ) {
                                                 //friend tab
                                          friendtab = true;
                                          invtab = false;
                                          questtab = false;
                                          settab = false;
                                              }else if ( 906 < MOUSEx && MOUSEx < 908+31 && 472 < MOUSEy && MOUSEy < 472+23 ) {
                                                         //quests tab
                                                  questtab = true;
                                                  friendtab = false;
                                                  settab = false;
                                                  invtab = false;
                                              }else if ( 874 < MOUSEx && MOUSEx < 874+32 && 472 < MOUSEy && MOUSEy < 472+26 ) {
                                                         //inventory tab
                                                  invtab = true;
                                                  questtab = false;
                                                  friendtab = false;
                                                  settab = false;
                                              }
 
                      //inventory tabs
                      e.consume();
                   }
 
 
        @Override
        public void mouseDragged(MouseEvent arg0) {
                // TODO Auto-generated method stub
        }
 
 
        @Override
        public void mouseMoved(MouseEvent e) {
                MOUSEy = e.getY();
                MOUSEx = e.getX();
               
                //hover over object:
                //examine(hover over object)
                          if ( 432 < MOUSEx && MOUSEx < 432+60 && 255 < MOUSEy && MOUSEy < 255+25 && paused) {
                  //pause screen
                         examine = "OK";
                      }else if ( 972 < MOUSEx && MOUSEx < 972+38 && 472 < MOUSEy && MOUSEy < 472+26 ) {
                  //Settings tab
                         examine = "Opties";
                      }else if ( 937 < MOUSEx && MOUSEx < 940+31 && 472 < MOUSEy && MOUSEy < 472+26 ) {
                                 //friend tab
                          examine = "Vrienden";
                              }else if ( 906 < MOUSEx && MOUSEx < 908+31 && 472 < MOUSEy && MOUSEy < 472+23 ) {
                                         //quests tab
                                  examine = "Doelen";
                              }else if ( 874 < MOUSEx && MOUSEx < 874+32 && 472 < MOUSEy && MOUSEy < 472+26 ) {
                                         //inventory tab
                                  examine = "Rugtas";
                              }else{
                          examine = " ";
                      }
        }
 
 
        @Override
        public void mouseClicked(MouseEvent arg0) {
                // TODO Auto-generated method stub
               
        }
 
 
        @Override
        public void mouseEntered(MouseEvent arg0) {
                // TODO Auto-generated method stub
               
        }
 
 
        @Override
        public void mouseExited(MouseEvent arg0) {
                // TODO Auto-generated method stub
               
        }
 
 
        @Override
        public void mouseReleased(MouseEvent arg0) {
                // TODO Auto-generated method stub
               
        }
}

[/code]

Applet code above this!
How can I place this applet into a JFrame?
I tried to add a main method to my class.
BOTH APPLETS/APPLICATIONS TESTED IN ECLIPSE!

[code] public static void main(String[] args) {

	    game applet = new game();

	    JFrame frame = new JFrame("My applet, as application");
	    frame.getContentPane().add(applet);

	    frame.setDefaultCloseOperation(JFrame.EXIT_ON_CLOSE);
	    frame.pack();
	    frame.show();
	}[/code]

Adding a main code into the class

But then this shows up!

Running as an application

Instead of this…(I know pro paint XD)

Running as an applet

Read full topic
